data.title: The Meme Boys
data.description: The Meme Boys are a team of 3 crypto degenerates that have the algorithm at their fingertips. They will make any meme possible to takeover the web and be on every cell phone screen on the entire planet. The team consists of Nick "Jonah" Antonyan (7,000,000 followers) , Directed By Stro (20,000,000,000 views directed), and Uncle Eddie (100,000 followers and full time degen).  Each month we will produce one original viral content piece, featuring agreed upon features and benefits of SEI. As well as a once a month mega spaces Co-hosted by Nick, Stro, and Uncle Eddie which will include our celebrity friends as special guests!
data.problem: In a crowded digital space, capturing and retaining audience attention has become increasingly difficult. Traditional marketing strategies often fail to resonate with the fast-paced, meme-driven culture of the internet. Brands struggle to break through the noise and create content that not only engages but also goes viral, generating real impact and visibility.
data.solution: Our solution is to leverage the power of expertly crafted, algorithm-driven memes to create viral content that resonates with the internet's ever-evolving culture. By combining our deep understanding of digital trends, creative storytelling, viral talent and a strategic approach to virality, we produce content that not only captures attention but also spreads organically across platforms. Each month, we deliver a high-impact original piece and host mega spaces with celebrity guests to amplify our reach and foster genuine engagement with our audience, all while promoting the key features and benefits of SEI.
data.missionSummary: To dominate the digital landscape by crafting viral, innovative content that captivates audiences and amplifies the influence of SEI. With our unmatched expertise in algorithm-driven meme creation and a network of celebrity collaborators, we aim to be the driving force behind cultural moments that shape the future of digital engagement for SEI

data.title: SEI the Memes
data.description:
"SEI the Memes" is a project that merges the world of memes with digital art, all powered by the SEI blockchain.

The platform allows users to collect exclusive meme-inspired artworks created by renowned artists, turning popular culture into valuable, lasting digital assets.

Leveraging SEI's fast, cheap, and secure blockchain, collectors can discover, own, and trade limited-edition NFTs from top-tier artists.
data.problem: Get more people active on SEI
data.solution: Allows people to collect exclusive meme-inspired artworks created by renowned artists, turning popular culture into valuable, lasting digital assets
data.missionSummary: Bring more people to the SEI blockchain by offering people to collect exclusive meme-inspired artworks created by renowned artists.

data.title: The meme boys (Nick Antonyan)
Unlimited Meme
data.description: I have been active in the crypto space for around 5 years, delving into different blockchains and market dynamics during this time. I love making Meme so much. As an "Meme Lord", my primary focus has been on cultivating the ecosystem of the SEI Network with Meme. I see the community and the team evolving and becoming increasingly involved with our supporters. My goal is to enhance my own skills while assisting others in discovering opportunities within the SEI framework.
data.problem: Individuals unfamiliar with the crypto market frequently feel overwhelmed, unsure of how to begin amid a sea of confusing information and numerous fraudulent projects. They find it challenging to identify reputable initiatives, while project teams struggle to connect with genuine users.
data.solution: I have been creating cryptocurrency-related Memes for about four years with passion. I believe memes are an integral part of the cryptocurrency market. A marketing campaign with the right Memes always generates attraction and great effectiveness. In the past year, I have focused solely on creating memes about SeiNetwork to support the development of the project. Additionally, I have a community of people who love and support my products.
data.missionSummary: I have the ability to educate a savvy crypto community through popular media platforms such as X (Twitter), Facebook, TikTok, and Telegram. By producing clear and engaging content, I can steer newcomers toward legitimate projects. This approach will also enable project teams to effectively promote their offerings and connect with users.
data.pathToTake: Want to grow through just grant funding

data.title: Sei Memecoin Hub
data.description: This project aims to enhance the memecoin trading ecosystem on the Sei Network by developing a Telegram bot for real-time trade tracking and market analysis. It also includes smart contract development tailored to Sei’s unique features, fostering faster and more efficient transactions. The project will provide educational content to onboard users and developers, driving engagement within the Sei ecosystem.
data.problem: The memecoin trading space lacks efficient tools and platforms tailored for the Sei network, limiting user experience and engagement. Traders need better resources to interact with Sei’s fast transaction speeds and decentralized exchange capabilities.
data.solution: The project will develop a user-friendly Telegram bot that simplifies memecoin trading, along with smart contracts optimized for Sei’s fast and scalable infrastructure. Educational resources will be created to guide new users, helping them understand and utilize Sei’s core features for memecoin trading.
data.missionSummary: Our mission is to empower the Sei community by building a seamless memecoin trading experience and fostering greater participation in the network. Through innovation, education, and accessible tools, we aim to contribute to Sei’s growth and position it as a leader in the memecoin space.
data.businessModel: The project will generate revenue through transaction fees within the Telegram bot for memecoin trading, offering premium features such as advanced market analytics and real-time trade alerts. Additionally, partnerships with memecoin projects on Sei will enable promotion and sponsored listings within the bot, creating advertising opportunities. The platform will also provide subscription-based educational content, offering in-depth tutorials and guides on Sei’s ecosystem, further monetizing user engagement. By delivering value-added services, the project will sustain growth while supporting the Sei network’s broader adoption.

data.description: A cutting-edge platform where users can bet on the virality of memes, utilizing AI to predict meme virality based on trends and user engagement.
data.title: Bet-a-meme
data.problem: Monetizing memes, a cornerstone of internet culture, remains a challenge.
data.solution: Bet-a-Meme empowers users to engage in meme virality as investors and participants, not just creators.

data.description:
> One 𝕏 ID = One Memecoin
> 

https://x-meme.fun/ 

### 1. What is 𝕏-meme?

𝕏-meme is a memecoin platform binding to 𝕏 ID, with fairness (no presale, no team allocation), sustainability (1% trade fee to 𝕏 ID holder), and efficiency (built-in risk-free leverage up to 50×).

![CleanShot 2025-01-05 at 22.54.40.png](https://public.degengate.fun/CleanShot_2025-01-05_at_22.54.40.png)

### 2. Are there creation fees on 𝕏-meme?

The first buyer of each Coin must pay an additional 0.01 ETH creation fee.

### 3. How to trade on 𝕏-meme?

- Step 1: Input 𝕏 username (coin auto-created).

![CleanShot 2025-01-05 at 22.15.22.png](https://public.degengate.fun/CleanShot_2025-01-05_at_22.15.22.png)

- Step 2: Multiply Buy or Buy on Website.

![CleanShot 2025-01-05 at 22.16.43.png](https://public.degengate.fun/CleanShot_2025-01-05_at_22.16.43.png)

![CleanShot 2025-01-05 at 22.17.13.png](https://public.degengate.fun/CleanShot_2025-01-05_at_22.17.13.png)

- Step 3: Sell anytime to lock in profits or losses.

![CleanShot 2025-01-05 at 22.20.12.png](https://public.degengate.fun/CleanShot_2025-01-05_at_22.20.12.png)

![CleanShot 2025-01-05 at 22.22.15.png](https://public.degengate.fun/CleanShot_2025-01-05_at_22.22.15.png)

### 4. What is the pricing curve on 𝕏-meme?

𝕏-meme uses a Bonding Curve Token trading curve, with a constant product curve formula of  K = x *y.

Each 𝕏 Meme Coin has a total supply of 1,000,000 tokens. Price range: [0.0001 ETH, ∞).

Price formula (The unit of x is Coin)

![tec1](https://public.degengate.fun/QianJianTec1742525212631.png)

![2025-01-05 15.39.33.jpg](https://public.degengate.fun/2025-01-05_15.39.33.jpg)

![markdown-image-615143](https://public.degengate.fun/markdown-image-615143.png)


### 5. How to claim your MemeCoin?

𝕏 ID holders can claim their Coin by visiting https://x-meme.fun/[𝕏 username] and following the claim process. Upon completion, the 𝕏 ID holder's wallet address will automatically receive the income.

![CleanShot 2025-01-05 at 15.26.20.png](https://public.degengate.fun/CleanShot_2025-01-05_at_15.26.20.png)

### 6. Tax Mechanisms.

𝕏-meme implements the following fee distribution:

- 𝕏 ID holders receive 1% automatic trade fee share after claiming their Coin
- Platform takes 0.6% platform-wide trade fee
- Platform charges 0.4% risk-free leverage fee

### 7. How to generate sustainable income on 𝕏-meme?

The platform ensures long-term revenue through multiple mechanisms:

- 𝕏 ID holders receive continuous 1% trading fee income
- 𝕏 ID coin buyers can increase their Coin’s value through community engagement and promotion

### 8. How to track assets?

After the official launch, you can directly view your assets on [https://x-meme.fun](https://x-meme.fun).

- Way 1: Connecting wallet and accessing your assets page.
- Way 2: Clicking wallet addresses in Trade/Rank lists.
- Way 3: Directly visiting https://x-meme.fun/user/[address].
    
    ![CleanShot 2025-01-05 at 22.52.40.png](https://public.degengate.fun/CleanShot_2025-01-05_at_22.52.40.png)
    
    ![CleanShot 2025-01-05 at 15.04.15.png](https://public.degengate.fun/CleanShot_2025-01-05_at_15.04.15.png)
    
    ![CleanShot 2025-01-05 at 15.06.18.png](https://public.degengate.fun/CleanShot_2025-01-05_at_15.06.18.png)
    

### 9. Are there trading restrictions?

Anyone can fairly trade any 𝕏 Meme Coin on the platform.

### 10. Explanation **Risk-free Multiply** mechanism.

𝕏-meme implements a contract-level risk-free multiply mechanism.

Based on bonding curve token, 𝕏-meme Coins can only be obtained through buy, which locks ETH into the contract in exchange for Coins. The ETH required for exchanging equivalent amounts of 𝕏-meme Coins only increases according to the bonding curve.

The team, after years of continuous exploration, has innovatively proposed a risk-free collateral mechanism:

Holders of 𝕏-meme Coin can

- Pledge the 𝕏-meme Coin they hold
- Lend out $ETH locked in the contract, while the pledged Coin remains locked in the contract.
- When redeeming the Coin, the $ETH is then returned to the contract.

Due to the unique issuance mechanism, the market price cannot fall below the borrowed price, even in extreme scenarios where all other holders sell.

### 11. How to expand the capital utilization rate to 50× on 𝕏-meme?

Users can leverage up to 50× during any Coin’s initial phase using minimum value through the risk-free multiply mechanism.

Simply check the multiply option in the purchase interface. Example: Use 0.1 ETH to buy a position of 47,619 𝕏-meme Coins (0.4% collateral fee applies; without Multiply, 5 ETH would be required for the same Coins).

![CleanShot 2025-01-05 at 14.54.03.png](https://public.degengate.fun/CleanShot_2025-01-05_at_14.54.03.png)

### 12. How to understand Debt and Net Value on 𝕏-meme?

When using Multiply, users are essentially performing risk-free multiply mechanism via smart contracts.

With market price fluctuations, direct gains can be obtained. At this time, it is necessary to first return the $ETH borrowed from the contract, and then obtain the profit from market fluctuations.

The $ETH borrowed is considered Debt, and the final profit is the Net Value.

![CleanShot 2025-01-05 at 22.20.12.png](https://public.degengate.fun/CleanShot_2025-01-05_at_22.20.12.png)

### 13. What are the advantages of playing 𝕏-meme compared to simple PvP?

Compared to platforms like [pump.fun](http://pump.fun), 𝕏-meme offers:

- Scarcity. One 𝕏 ID = One 𝕏 Memecoin. Each 𝕏 ID has a unique Memecoin.
- Quantify Social Value. 𝕏-meme Coin represents the social value of 𝕏 ID, not limited to "Meme", while it opens a brand new investment and revenue channel for Holders and Followers.
- 𝕏 ID Holders have sustainable income. Influencers KOL, media, or open-source projects can all gain continuous income through 𝕏-meme. [7. How to generate sustainable income on 𝕏-meme?](https://www.notion.so/7-How-to-generate-sustainable-income-on-meme-1737857e1f8f81768a8bd22967dd20cb?pvs=21)*
- Here are multiple ways to purchase Coins (normal purchase, risk-free leveraged purchase), traders can further expand more PvP gameplay through more complex mixed trading methods, on a fair basis.

### 14. 𝕏-meme contract information.

𝕏-meme is deployed on Base chain with verified and open-sourced contracts.
Details: [https://github.com/degengate/contract](https://github.com/degengate/contract)  and [https://x.com/xmemefun/status/1875861280718045247](https://x.com/xmemefun/status/1875861280718045247)

### 15. The API interface and example code of 𝕏-meme.

𝕏-meme provides a public subgraph for developers to build custom trading frameworks.

Playground: [https://thegraph.com/explorer/subgraphs/GHwNcuWaNoKkVkYtjA7Ftz2qAZC2ETGdsetWMgRojtoe?view=Query&chain=arbitrum-one](https://thegraph.com/explorer/subgraphs/GHwNcuWaNoKkVkYtjA7Ftz2qAZC2ETGdsetWMgRojtoe?view=Query&chain=arbitrum-one)

API: https://gateway.thegraph.com/api/[api-key]/subgraphs/id/GHwNcuWaNoKkVkYtjA7Ftz2qAZC2ETGdsetWMgRojtoe

> Powered By Public Token - Beta version
>

[中文版](https://www.notion.so/meme-FAQ-7011ef2b0bc34fc29e6e53add67f60b4?pvs=21)
data.title: 𝕏-meme

data.description:
#### MemeCatLandar – The First AI-Powered Meme Calendar

### Hybrid Web3 DApp with DAO Elements and Custom AI

Memes are more than entertainment — they shape digital culture. **MemeCatLandar** is a **first-of-its-kind hybrid Web3 DApp** that fuses **AI, DAO governance, and blockchain** to create the **world’s first AI-powered meme calendar**, where users vote, curate, and immortalize the most iconic memes.

## Why It Matters?
🚀 **AI-Powered Curation** – The best memes get ranked, featured, and never lost.

🎭 **DAO Voting** – The community decides which memes make history.

🔐 **Secure & Simple Access** – Login via Google OAuth, no hassle.

🎡 **MemeCaWheel** – A viral tool for **fundraising + meme promotion** in one click.

📢 **Telegram Auto-Posting** – More reach, more engagement, more fun.

## The Impact
MemeCatLandar is **one-of-a-kind** — no other platform offers an interactive, AI-driven **meme archive** that also empowers creators and rewards engagement. The meme industry is massive, but **nobody has structured it like this**.

## Why Support Us?
Your grant will help us scale, refine AI curation, and expand our ecosystem, giving meme creators **a new way to be seen, valued, and rewarded**.

Meme culture is **the voice of the internet**. MemeCatLandar makes sure it’s heard.

data.description: Celo Proof of Ship is a Web3-native credentialing system that allows developers to demonstrate their end-to-end contributions to a project. By integrating with GitHub, it verifies consistent code commits over time. Developers then showcase their progress by deploying smart contracts on both testnet and mainnet, ensuring their work is functional and publicly accessible. To amplify visibility, participants share their developments across decentralized social platforms like Farcaster.

questions.query: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.
How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.
questions.explanation:
X-Meme significantly contributes to the OSS ecosystem by providing a decentralized and transparent financial infrastructure tailored for social value quantification and memecoin markets, binding memecoins directly to decentralized IDs (𝕏 IDs). X-Meme is fully open-source,  its contracts are publicly verified and accessible on GitHub, allowing developers and communities to freely audit, fork, or build upon the project.

Specifically, X-Meme contributes to the OSS ecosystem by:

1. Open-Source Contract Infrastructure: All X-Meme smart contracts are fully open-source and accessible on GitHub, promoting transparency and trust. Developers can freely leverage this infrastructure to build new decentralized financial applications or enhance existing ones, fostering innovation and collaboration.

2. Public API and Developer Tools: X-Meme offers a public subgraph via The Graph Protocol, providing developers easy access to indexed blockchain data for creating custom analytics tools, trading bots, or decentralized applications. This substantially lowers the entry barrier for developers aiming to participate in and expand the OSS ecosystem.

3. Innovative Risk-Free Leverage Mechanism: X-Meme introduces a unique, contract-level risk-free multiply mechanism, enabling efficient capital utilization (up to 50× leverage) without liquidation risk. This novel mechanism can serve as a valuable reference model for other OSS DeFi projects, stimulating further research and innovation in decentralized financial engineering.

4. Social Value Quantification: By linking memecoins directly with decentralized social identities (𝕏 IDs), X-Meme opens up new possibilities for quantifying social influence and contributions, benefiting content creators, influencers, and open-source contributors by enabling sustainable and fair economic rewards.

Through these mechanisms, X-Meme not only expands the financial opportunities within the OSS community but also inspires innovation and supports the sustainable growth of the decentralized application ecosystem.

questions.query: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?
questions.explanation:
X-Meme provides several unique features and practical use cases:

1. One 𝕏 ID = One Memecoin: Each decentralized social ID (𝕏 ID) generates a unique memecoin, directly linking a user's social identity to their economic value.

2. Risk-Free Leverage: Allows users to access up to 50× leverage without liquidation risk through a novel, secure collateral mechanism, dramatically enhancing capital efficiency.

3. Automatic Revenue Distribution: Implements a sustainable fee distribution model, with 1% of all transaction fees automatically distributed to 𝕏 ID holders, ensuring continuous passive income.

4. Bonding Curve Pricing: Utilizes an innovative bonding curve pricing model, ensuring price discovery and liquidity without requiring external market makers.

Differentiation:

1. Social ID Binding: Unlike typical memecoin platforms, X-Meme uniquely binds economic value to social identities, quantifying social influence directly into monetary value.

2. No Presale or Team Allocation: Emphasizes fairness by having no token presale or dedicated team token allocation, avoiding centralized token distribution issues.

3. Risk-Free Collateral: Unique risk-free collateral mechanism distinguishes X-Meme from traditional leverage-based platforms, eliminating liquidation risks inherent in other DeFi systems.

4. Decentralized and Transparent: Fully open-source infrastructure ensures transparency, decentralization, and community trust, setting it apart from centralized or semi-centralized competitors.

questions.query: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?
questions.explanation:
X-Meme plans to focus on several key development areas:

1. Enhanced Developer Ecosystem: Expand developer resources and documentation, offering workshops and tutorials to facilitate the creation of decentralized applications on top of X-Meme.

2. Scalability and Optimization: Improve the current infrastructure and contracts for higher scalability, lower gas fees, and better user experiences.

3. Cross-chain Compatibility: Explore and develop cross-chain solutions, enabling X-Meme to interact seamlessly with multiple blockchain ecosystems.

4. Community Growth and Education: Promote community growth through educational initiatives, marketing campaigns, and partnerships, ensuring broader adoption and community-driven development.

Grant funds will specifically be utilized to achieve these goals by:

1. Allocating resources towards developer relations and community education.

2. Funding technical research and development for scalability enhancements and cross-chain integrations.

3. Supporting marketing and strategic partnership initiatives to drive user adoption and community expansion.

questions.query: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.
How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.
questions.explanation: Our project, MemeCatlendar, supports the OSS ecosystem by leveraging and extending open-source tools like Supabase and Next.js. We actively contribute by sharing fixes, improving documentation, and building a fun, engaging platform that showcases the power of open-source tech. MemeCatlendar is fully open-source, encouraging community collaboration and creative experimentation around meme culture and Web3 integrations.

questions.query: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?
questions.explanation: MemeCatlendar is a unique Web3-powered calendar where users can publish memes tied to specific dates. It allows creators to schedule, showcase, and celebrate meme culture daily. Key features include meme submission, voting, and discoverability through a playful calendar UI. Unlike typical meme platforms, MemeCatlendar time-stamps content and optionally links it to NFTs, preserving meme originality and boosting creator visibility.

questions.query: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?
questions.explanation: We plan to expand MemeCatlendar with user profiles, meme leaderboards, on-chain minting, and seasonal meme contests. We’ll also improve UI/UX, add mobile responsiveness, and enhance moderation tools. Grant funds will be used for development, smart contract audits, infrastructure (Supabase, hosting), and community growth through meme bounties and collaborations.
